tn

Class Route

  • java.lang.Object
    • tn.Route
  • Direct Known Subclasses:
    MultipathRoute, Path

    public abstract class Route
extends java.lang.Object
    A general route from an origin node to a destination node. A route can be a single path or multipath.
    Author:
    Saleh

      The network context in which this path exists

      • combineWith

        public abstract Route combineWith(Route other,
                                  double ratio)
        Linearly combine the given route with this route. The resulting route satisfies the following formula: result.getLinkProbability(i) = ratio* this.getLinkProbability(i) + (1-ratio) other.getLinkProbability(i) for every link i in this.getLinks() UNION other.getLinks();
        Parameters:
        other - the other route which is to be combined with this one
        ratio - the coefficient for this route probability. (1-ratio) is the
        Returns:
        combined route if this route can be linearly combined with the other route into one combined route. Otherwise returns null.
